PriceObject.description: A common component definng a 'Price', used for financial measures such as Unit Prices, Totals etc

ExTax.description: The financial amount of the Price, exclusive of any tax.  One of this OR IncTax OR Tax required

IncTax.description: The financial amount of the Price, inclusive of any tax.  One of this OR ExTax OR Tax required

Tax.description: The financial tax amount of the Price, sometimes explicit, sometimes can be derived as IncTax - ExTax.  One of this OR ExTax OR IncTax required

Localisation.description: The localisation of the price indicating the locale of the LCY values e.g UK, IE

Currency.description: The canonical Currency of the price

Lineage.description: The event lineage (e.g eventId, asOf) that lead to the observed/derived state of this object/data part
